verses.roman:
cāṅgera upare tomāra caraṇa dhyāna kailuṅ
caraṇa-smaraṇa-prabhāve ei phala pāiluṅ

synonyms: cāṅgera upare—on the cāṅga; tomāra caraṇa—on Your lotus feet; dhyāna kailuṅ—I meditated; caraṇa-smaraṇa-prabhāve—by the power of remembering Your lotus feet; ei phala—these results; pāiluṅ—I have got.
translation: "On the cāṅga I began meditating upon Your lotus feet, and the power of that remembrance has yielded all these results.
